Articles.Content: Fellow Kerbals, stay awesome and let's rule the Kerbol system with a rubber, spongy fist!
Greetings! Be sure to check out the fine videos available over in [Live from Mission Control](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/53-Live-from-Mission-Control%21).

Rubber, Spongy, Fist, you say? 

I personally have a particular affinity for tungsten steel mesh fists, but, I suppose, what ever works, works:wink:.

---

And Salutations! Welcome to the forums, and good luck landing intact (more or less).
Welcome to the forums! One of the nicest places to be online for sure. Cant wait to see your creations explode ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
